name: PopFic-Read Romance Webnovels
description:
PopFic, Focus on Reading Webnovels.

Update Reminder, Intelligent Recommendation, Super Easy to Use!

【Reading With Easy 】
· Personalized page-turning setting: scroll, flip or slide the pages as you want.
· Eye-caring mode: personalized background color will never let your read become dull.
· Font size setting: big or small, all at your disposal.
· Reading model: Daytime Mode and Night Mode for you to choose, you can enjoy an easy read at anytime.
· Build Your Own Library: Enjoy your favorites in your own world.

Join PopFic, Reading Webnovels Anytime, Anywhere!

SUBSCRIPTION TERMS:

PopFic offers two types of auto-renewing subscription options:
1、Coins Package Weekly
$14.99 per week: Get 1500 Coins at once, in addition to 100 Coins per day, for a total of 2200 Coins.
2、Coins Package Monthly
$39.99 per month: Get 4000 Coins at once, in addition to 100 Coins per day, for a total of 7100 Coins.

These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.
The subscription will automatically renew unless turned off in your iTunes Account Settings at least 24 hours before the current period ends. You can go to your iTunes Account settings to manage your subscription and turn off auto-renew. Your iTunes Account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed.

Privacy Policy: https://thepopfic.com/privacy.
Terms of Service: https://thepopfic.com/termsOfService.
